Theme Description:

Half Slider is a half page height, full width image slider template for Bootstrap 3. This theme is great for creating landing pages or one page websites.

Theme Features:

  • Half page height, full width image slider
  • Caption markup included
  • Easy to edit, inline CSS for handling background images
  • Content section below the slider
